thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Limelight Networks Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.01

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Limelight Networks Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.01
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Limelight Networks Inc:
* LIMELIGHT NETWORKS REPORTS RECORD FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FINANCIALS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.04 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.01 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 10 PERCENT TO $48.2 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $196 MILLION TO $200 MILLION * SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES BETWEEN $22 MILLION AND $24 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01, REVENUE VIEW $47.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* LIMELIGHT NETWORKS - SEES 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE BETWEEN $0.11 AND $0.15 PER SHARE
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.11, REVENUE VIEW $197.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
